Member Of The Aden Vanguard Elise:
Who's there?! Oh, I thought it was the enemy. I'm sorry. There is dangerous, so extra caution wouldn't hurt.
Did you see what happened? We were defending the base, to spare no effort. However, at some point it seemed to me that all is lost, so these Embryo raged!
